content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Mr. Abbasi, it's a pleasure to meet you. I hope you find the apartment to your liking. Regarding the rental price, I'm sure we can find a fair agreement that suits both our needs. How much were you considering?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Well, Mister Schmidt. I am a student and I am on a budget. I was thinking of 400 euros per month. This is a reasonable price for an unfurnished apartment of this size in the city center, is it not?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: 400 euros per month is indeed a very attractive price, especially for an apartment in the city center. However, considering the current market trends and the quality of the apartment, I believe we can aim a bit higher. How does 500 euros per month sound to you? This is still a competitive price for the area and reflects the value of the property.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I am willing to pay 450 euros per month. This is the highest amount I can pay. As I said before, I am on a student budget. I believe this is a fair price for an unfurnished apartment of this size in the city center.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand your budget constraints, Mr. Abbasi. 450 euros per month is a fair offer, and I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle. However, I must consider the investment I've made in this property and the competitive nature of the rental market. Could we perhaps settle on 475 euros per month? This would be a fair compromise and still align with the market value of similar apartments in the area. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I agree to the price of 460 euros per month. This is the highest amount I can pay. I believe this is a fair price for an unfurnished apartment of this size in the city center.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Thank you for your generosity, Mr. Abbasi. I appreciate your willingness to pay 460 euros per month. This is a fair price that reflects the value of the apartment in the city center. I am pleased to offer you the apartment at this rate. 'I agree to the price of 460 Euros!'
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. This is a nice price for a newly built, unfurnished, 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. It is close to all important facilities like supermarket, public transportation, etc. I am very satisfied with the agreement.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: You're welcome, Mr. Abbasi. I'm glad to hear that you're satisfied with the agreement. The apartment is indeed a great find, and I'm sure you'll enjoy living in it. Please let me know if there's anything else I can assist you with. 'TERMINATE'
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
